messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rogpeppe@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

On Wed, Feb 15, 2012 at 1:17 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: r,
>
> Message:
> Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rogpeppe@gmail.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg
>
>
> Description:
> strings: add Bernardo O'Higgins example
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5673049/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5673049/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/strings/example_test.**go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/strings/example_test.**go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/strings/example_**test.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/strings/example_**test.go
> @@ -93,10 +93,12 @@
>  // ["a" "b" "c"]
>  // ["" "man " "plan " "canal panama"]
>  // [" " "x" "y" "z" " "]
> +// [""]
>  func ExampleSplit() {
>        fmt.Printf("%q\n", strings.Split("a,b,c", ","))
>        fmt.Printf("%q\n", strings.Split("a man a plan a canal panama", "a
> "))
>        fmt.Printf("%q\n", strings.Split(" xyz ", ""))
> +       fmt.Printf("%q\n", strings.Split("", "Bernardo O'Higgins"))
>  }
>
>  // ["a" "b,c"]
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=089f4509657a ***

strings: add Bernardo O'Higgins example

R=r, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev, rogpeppe
http://codereview.appspot.com/5673049

LGTM

2012/2/15 Rob 'Commander' Pike <r@google.com>:
> LGTM
>
> next up, Giuseppe Garibaldi
>

subject: code review 5673049: strings: add Bernardo O'Higgins example
